NFT.FIELD.NAME.LABEL: Name of NFT
NFT.FIELD.STATUS.LABEL: Status
NFT.FIELD.DESCRIPTION.LABEL: NFT Description
NFT.FIELD.DESCRIPTION.HINT: The description that appears alongside your NFT details page. If you have unlockable content with this NFT you should add that information in the Unlockable Content section further down.
NFT.FIELD.COLLECTION.LABEL: Collection
NFT.FIELD.COLLECTION.HINT: Is this part of a collection of NFTs? Example: The John Doe Collection
NFT.FIELD.SPORT.LABEL: Sport
NFT.FIELD.ATHLETE.LABEL: Athlete
NFT.FIELD.ARTIST.LABEL: Artist
NFT.FIELD.SUPPLY.LABEL: Supply
NFT.FIELD.SUPPLY.HINT: The total number of this item to be created
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.LABEL: Unlockable Content
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.HINT: Include unlockable content that can only be revealed by the owner of the item.
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.CLAIM.TYPE.LABEL: Type of Claim
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.CLAIM.TYPE.HINT:
Please choose from the following:
One Time Claim: Once claimed, this content will not be available for the next owner if the NFT is sold.
Unlimited: Once claimed the content will still be available for the next owner if the NFT is sold.
Custom Value: You can enter the number of times the content will be claimable for the consecutive owners.
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.CLAIM.LIMIT.LABEL: Custom Claim Limit
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.CLAIM.LIMIT.HINT: Choose the number of times this content can be claimed.
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.HAS.EXPIRY.LABEL: Set Unlockable Content Expiry
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.HAS.EXPIRY.HINT: Switch on if you want the unlockable content to expire after a certain date.
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.EXPIRY.DATE.LABEL: Expiry Date
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.EXPIRY.DATE.HINT: Set the date and time of when the content expires. When the time expires the content will no longer be claimable.
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.PREVIEW.TEXT.LABEL: Unlockable Content Preview Text
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.PREVIEW.TEXT.HINT: Let everyone know a brief description of what to expect if they purchase this NFT and claim this unlockable content. This will act as the preview text. Do not give away sensitive details that would sit inside the unlockable content.
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.PREVIEW.TEXT.PLACEH: e.g. By claiming this NFT you can get your exclusive voucher code giving you access to concert tickets.
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.DESCRIPTION.LABEL: Unlockable Content Description
NFT.FIELD.UNLOCKABLE.DESCRIPTION.HINT: The information that appears once someone has claimed the unlockable content. Here is where you add the content that was meant to be hidden such as instructions to redeem access codes, voucher codes, links to a file etc.
NFT.FIELD.CATEGORY.LABEL: Category
NFT.FIELD.GENRE.LABEL: Genre / Sub Category
